description: Drupal website created for a customer to address the client business reuqirements. SEO optimizied - 1st result on Google search!
Fully responsive React eCommerce application fetching data from server-side API and deployed using Netlify!
InspireMe is a charity organisation based in Brixton London which specialises in human development through motivational public speaking conferences!
A one-stop holiday planning site using few APIs - (OpenWeatherMap, ExchangeRate, Calendarific, Google Maps)!
Command-line application to generate README.md files from user input. Optimizied for Github and using nice looking badges and icons!
Simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each business hour of the day. Using the browser local storage!
5 Day Weather Forecast - retrieve weather data from OpenWeatherMap and store the search history in the browser local storage!
Timed coding quiz app with multiple-choice questions, dynamically update HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript that stores high scores.
Generate a random password based on different character types (Lowercase, Uppercase, Numeric, Special characters).
